long_description: The streamlined, sachel-style Timbuk2 Spin small-size messenger bag is built for speed. Lightweight and simple to access, it's perfect for errands on the run or daily commutes. Secure rip-and-stick flap closure allows quick access to your goods. Durable ballistic nylon exterior and lightweight nylon interior; watertight flap is constructed to keep water from getting inside and soaking your stuff. Cam buckle adjustment on the shoulder strap is quick and easy to adjust to the perfect length, and the design eliminates the need for daily fit adjustments. Slash sleeve pocket on the interior back wall of the Timbuk2 Spin Messenger fits most 13 in. laptops. Internal zip pocket and organizer holds pens and i-gadgets. Includes a strap pad to keep your shoulder comfortable. External light loop is the perfect spot for a blinky light (sold separately).
short_description: The streamlined, sachel-style Timbuk2 Spin small-size messenger bag is built for speed. Lightweight and simple to access, it's perfect for errands on the run or daily commutes.
